name: Pyromantic
description:
Pyromantic is a puzzle game based on the handling of fire. Starting with a small flame your goal is to keep the fire alive take it around the level using different materials and tools and finally to ignite the bonfire. 

The game has been developed within less than two days for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. I have been participating as a one-man team and tried to play around with this experimental mechanic, therefore the game is still in a prototype stage. Since I thought the fire mechanics turned out to be quite fun, I will certainly develop it further, add more levels and variety and polish it in the future.
